synopsis.text: Hatsuki, Ayumi, and Mio, three young girls living in a dystopian future where physical interaction is scarce and virtual reality reigns supreme, find themselves entangled in a sinister mystery when their friend Yuko goes missing. In a world ravaged by a virus and governed through cameras, the girls, along with an unregistered martial artist named Myao, embark on a perilous journey to find Yuko in the real world. As they navigate through the complexities of their heavily monitored society, they stumble upon a chilling series of murders targeting junior high children. With a killer on the loose and their communications under constant surveillance, the girls must unravel the dark secrets behind the killings and confront the possibility that they may be the next targets. Plug into the thrilling animated world of Loups=Garous, where virtual reality, ancient legends, and shocking revelations collide.
